item.title: PRNU Python
item.description: Authors Mirco Ceccarelli Francesco Argentieri Relators Prof. Alessandro Piva Dott. Dasara Shullani Dott. Daniele Baracchi Introduction In this project we have dealt with a branch of the Multimedia Forensics: Device Identification (know what device has taken a photo). In order to do this, a noise that is introduced by the sensors of each digital camera, is exploited: the PRNU (Photo Response Non Uniformity), which is different for each individual device.
